Text:
Note the 24fps frame rate on this file. This is a much poorer-quality version (albeit half the file size) of the same source as Horrorspoke's torrent:

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7639001/The_Dark_Knight_Rises_2012_720P_HDTS_x264_LiNE-JYK

 If you want a higher-than-average-CAM-quality version of this film, I suggest Horrorspoke's torrent in the link above.

@TheHeiliger:-
Horrorspoke's torrent frame rate is 23.976fps so there so difference it both of them.

@Gh0stNet: My mistake, Gh0stNet. My apologies, and thank you for correcting me. You are right. For some reason, your file's frame rate seems far lower on my machine (watching on VLC) than the one I linked to above, however; it may just be on my end. Thanks for uploading!
I think its more that the frame rate drops when theres motion, something in the capture or conversion was unable to handle.
great movie man thanks...so much for this...
